Description:
Apt Resources is a recruitment company that is looking for a Female Butler to join the team of one of their clients, a UHNWF. As a butler, you will be responsible for providing personalized service that caters to the unique needs and preferences of our ultra-high-net-worth clients. You will be expected to handle a range of tasks that are aimed at enhancing our clients' lifestyles, ensuring their comfort, and providing seamless execution of their daily operations.Maintain an organized and efficient household by managing and delegating tasks to other staff.
Coordinate and oversee the delivery of services to our UHNWF.
Greet and receive guests according to our clientâ€™s preferred instructions and guidelines.
Manage the household inventory and maintain adequate supplies for all necessary items in the household.
Provide personal care and grooming for our clients.
Plan and supervise household projects, repairs, and renovations.
Maintain strict confidentiality and respect the privacy of our clients at all times.Job Details
